pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Papers of Rochester's first African American radio personality broadcasting on WSAY, including scripts for The Vignettes, The Gospel Hour, The Bronze Trombones, The King Coles Show and other programs, 1946-1974, and related material. Collection also includes tapes of the programs.
